attributes.action: Make sure our government funds and keeps our NHS!
attributes.additional_details: The politicians have been going back on their words, we were told an extra 350million would be given to NHS if we left the union. our job as a country to make sure the future of the NHS thrives let's make it happen.
attributes.background: As a country we all need the NHS, let's prevent them privatising our national health service! And make sure they continue to fund it for the sake of our people!
